record.text: While i'll give the benefit of doubt that you've only stumbled upon this image (have seen it passed around), I strongly suggest reviewing the images you've posted, since generative AI exacerbates some real world problems that the American left have often criticized.

You see, the problem there was that you didn't use the plagiarism engine to put a nonconsenting cosplay model in skimpy lingerie. Even before that, I'm sure you've already seen the stupid lengths I take to avoid eating a shadowban. In fact, nikkisayo_yyc was my 2nd acc (3rd if counting flashn00b)

There are other ways to post images online that don't exacerbate the real world issues that I have mentioned. For myself, it's the camera. For others, it's the pencil, the drawing tablet, the mouse, hell... some people still make pictures with an old-ass IBM and an EGA textmode terminal.

external.description: As news spread Saturday of President Donald Trump's removal of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, a split screen emerged in Congress: Republicans largely celebrated the military operation, while Democrats condemned the president's actions and questioned their legality. After months of pressure on Maduro, Trump announced on Truth Social that the U.S. had assisted in a "large scale strike" against the country and its leader, who was captured along with his wife, Cilia Flores, and is being brought to the U.S.

record.text:
The Grisliest Bitcoin and Crypto Wrench Attacks That Grabbed Headlines in 2025

In brief The amount of documented wrench attacks has increased in 2025 amid Bitcoin's price rise. At least 65 have been tracked in a public database, with many more expected to be unreported. Some of the most grisly…

external.description: In brief The amount of documented wrench attacks has increased in 2025 amid Bitcoin's price rise. At least 65 have been tracked in a public database, with many more expected to be unreported. Some of the most grisly crimes include murder, severed fingers, and sexual assaults. Crypto’s growing mainstream presence has not been all good news for investors.  Alongside Bitcoin's price rise, a growing list of wrench attacks—that is, physical attacks meant to coerce a victim to hand over access to their crypto holdings—have taken place over the course of 2025.
external.title: The Grisliest Bitcoin and Crypto Wrench Attacks That Grabbed Headlines in 2025

Watch as Bullish Inflows Send Hamilton Shares Higher

HG is a specialty insurance and reinsurance company operating globally, though primarily in Bermuda. The company’s third-quarter fiscal 2025 earnings report showed net income of $136 million (a 21% annualized return on equity), a loss ratio of…

external.description: HG is a specialty insurance and reinsurance company operating globally, though primarily in Bermuda. The company’s third-quarter fiscal 2025 earnings report showed net income of $136 million (a 21% annualized return on equity), a loss ratio of 53.3% (down from 61%), and operating income of $123 million ($1.20 per diluted share). It’s no wonder HG shares were up 47% last year.

record.bridgyOriginalText:
I wonder how much damage ChatGPT (in this case, 5.2) causes to people who follow its instructions without checking.

In this case, I saw where it was heading and was curious if it would just tell me to wipe out all my files, so I went with it. And it did.

It's told me to do some pretty destructive things in the past which I have caught, but casually wiping out an entire instance with all of its user-data and trying to frame that as "good news" and pointing out that I should "Accept the loss as done" (which to be fair, would be the only possible action in this case) is about as dangerous as it gets.

#ChatGPT #Dangerous #AI #Safety #Tech

先程「露出した肌から判断している？」と書きましたが「とりあえず、体のラインは裸にするで良くね？」がGrokの認識なのかもしれません？
一方で、甲を「残す物」として認識していたり、思考がよく分からなかったりです（命令が「白衣を残して」なので白を全て『白衣』として認識した？）。

今後、画像へのフェイク化対策ってどうしたら良いのでしょうか…命令制限付与は可能のようですが、抜け穴が見つからないことを祈ります。

もう1枚。
「オリジナル戦闘員」風の全身タイツ画像（背面は処理）に対し「ビキニを着せて、かつ背景は『極寒の地』にして」とした結果がコチラです。
先程と異なり、全身タイツ部分を「肌の色では無い」と認識（部分的に露出している手首から判断？）して首から下と手以外を裸ビキニに変えてしまいました。
…これは…マズイですよね。

なお、Xとしては「センシティブな画像」扱いの模様（一応、コチラも設定）…39歳・独身男性のビキニ姿のどこがセンシティブ（神経質）なんだか…いや、そうか。
あと、タイツのラインに沿って肌と肉質を加えているためかリアル体型に近い肉付きを出力してきた点…凄いけど無駄機能過ぎませんか？

X（旧Twitter）にて問題となっている、Grokの画像編集機能。
試しに使ってみましたが「色の合うビキニ姿にして」と命令したら、背面であることを認識しただけでなく僧侶の前掛けをパレオにするアドリブも…ただし、肌の色は理解出来たり出来なかったりの様子ですが（当日はAmoresyのオレンジを着用）。

これ、男女関係無く「嫌な人には嫌」な機能だなぁ…と思ったりです。
AIの進歩には驚くものの、制限が無さ過ぎてフェイク画像作り放題という…どうなることやら？

なお、使用した画像は今年の弁慶まつり（和歌山県・田辺市）で撮影しました自身になります（Xではアップしていましたが、こちらでは失念…）。

record.text: the "grok apology" that lazy news sites are all reporting on WASN'T EVEN A STATEMENT FROM xAI, IT WAS A USER PROMPT

Allow me to connect some dots for you:

Too much of the world currently relies for its basic functions on resources which must be continuously extracted. You burn that oil one time and oops, now you need more.

Geopolitical horrors are, in fact, one of the reasons we need to move to renewables ASAP.

昨日ここでもpostしたけども。

ララァとニュータイプはその後、記録全集での星山さんの語りや、富野さんの演出を知って、テレビ版ガンダムやったこと（やりたかったことと言うより、富野さんと脚本家さん達の意思疎通ができない中でも、そのへんの落とし所、そして話の畳み方を模索してあの形になったのだろう）は分かったけども。

初見の時のサイケデリックなドラッグムービーな印象（観念的すぎてよくわからず）はそれほど「外してなかったな」というのはある。

record.text:
grokでレイヤーさんを剥いて喜んでるような輩は結局、アニメや漫画のエロ二次と同じようなノリで生身の人間を扱ってる、分別のついてないバカでしかないし、そのバカをエロスが分かってないだのと「茶化してる」のがバズってるのも分別がついてない。
そういう輩がやってるのは「生身の人間に対する加害」なのに。面白おかしく大喜利化して誤魔化すな。

だから何が悪いのかわかんなくなるんだよ。
「法や人権など所詮フィクション」みたいなことが言われるのを見ると「でもそのフィクションを捨てたら、道端で急に知らんやつからタコ殴りにされて財布を奪われても、加害者の方が立場が上であれば『お前がそこにいたのが悪い』ってほっぽっとかれることになるんだけど、それで問題ないんだろうか」と不思議に思う
